label: 京都守護
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
説明文: Minamoto Yoritomo posted a representative called the Kyōto shugo in the city [Kyoto]. Nominally his duties included policing Kyoto, but in practice the Bureau of Capital Police (Kebiishichō) [検非違使庁] continued in its accustomed role at the neighborhood level.
